name: The Last Guard (Zodiak707)
description:
You are the only one who survived the attack on the castle. Defend the castle against the Goblin attack.

Control
Move left: A
Move right: B
Attack: Left mouse button or Strg

Credits:

  1. Graphic
    1. Tileset by: https://anokolisa.itch.io/
    2. Player by: https://aamatniekss.itch.io/
    3. Goblins by: https://luizmelo.itch.io/
  2. SFX
    1. Alls SFX by: https://freesound.org/
